p: The weights, pH values, Warnerâ€“Bratzler shear force and color parameters measured in LL and SET muscles of FD bucks are presented in Table 4. None of the physical components differed significantly except where stated. The supplemented diets resulted in heavier LL muscles in Groups B and BL compared with Group P ( P < 0.05), whereas no apparent effect of diet ( P = 0.472) on the weight of the SET muscle was observed among the individual groups. In addition, diet had no apparent effect on the pH u values of either LL or SET muscles after slaughter.
